name: Aer Lingus AERSPACE Review on the GORGEOUS A321LR: what is it like???
description:
Get Surfshark VPN at http://surfshark.deals/winginit - Enter promo code WINGINIT for 83% off and THREE EXTRA MONTHS for free!

WATCH NOW: My AMAZING trip to the Isles of Scilly! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=na9DkXYffQ8

Welcome aboard Aer Lingus' new-ish European premium product, AerSpace. They don't market this as a business class and...it's sort of confusing...especially during the pandemic! But it was still a great experience and the A321LR is a super piece of kit I'd love to fly on to the States when it reopens for British travellers!
